PDA with information about the Zone consisting of digital logs, detailed maps and locations of anomalies. Trading value could be high if you find the right buyer.

A pocket-sized electronic device meant to encompass the basic and most vital functions of a computer. The PDA is essential for daily information sharing. It comes pre-installed with a GPS module to provide geolocation and time information to the user.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:

A pocket-sized electronic device meant to encompass the basic and most vital functions of a computer. The PDA is essential for daily information sharing. It comes with pre-installed GPS module to provide geolocation and time information to the user. The module in this version has been improved to retrieve and process the position of other modules connected to the network in a radius of 300 meters, which makes this PDA compelling among stalkers.
 
 This particular device is also able to locate the dead bodies of targets eliminated by the owner because somebody has jailbroken it and installed a pirated version of IMI KilTrak software.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]low electric power consumption
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2]%c[ui_gray_2]shows location of nearby squads from your group

A pocket-sized electronic device meant to encompass the basic and most vital functions of a computer. The PDA is essential for daily information sharing. It comes pre-installed with a GPS module to provide geolocation and time information to the user. This module version has been greatly improved to retrieve and process the position of other modules connected to the network, making this PDA compelling among stalkers. Unlike usual GPS modules, this one relies on a set of codes that allow the module to acquire special privileges on the connected network and acquire more information.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]low electric power consumption
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2]%c[ui_gray_2]shows location of nearby natural squads

This dated anomalous activity detector produces an alarm signal when anomalous particles enter a special chamber as you approach an anomaly. It can also register the presence of artefacts and measure the distance to the nearest one. The distance is indicated by the frequency of the sound the detector emits. To switch to artefact search mode, open the device's front cover. Due to its simple design, it can only be used to locate the most common artefacts.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]moderate electric power consumption

This last generation anomalous activity detector can be used to locate anomalous formations and has a colour diode panel, which not only indicates the direction of artefacts, but also measures the distance to them. To switch to artefact search mode, open the device's front cover. Unfortunately, the device is programmed with a somewhat outdated list of detectable artefacts.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]moderate electric power consumption

A next generation, scientific detector. Thanks to its three, advanced detection chambers, the position of the artefact is displayed on a special LED screen in realtime. When closed, the device registers only the particles of radiation and anomalies. To switch to artefact search mode, open the front LED display. When in search mode, the detector is capable of locating all artefacts known to science.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]high electric power consumption

A prototype detector, with the expanded functionality of an anomalous frequency scanner. This device comes with a program that identifies any static areas of anomalous activity stored in the database, while retaining the ability to locate artefacts. The positions of both anomalous areas and artefacts are displayed on a special LED screen. The artefact search mode, which can be activated by opening the front LED display, has been modified to detect even anomalous formations currently unknown to science.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]high electric power consumption

The RF (Radio frequencies) receiver is a small device with a highly-sensitive RF module used for basic communications. Quite common among soldiers despite the old technology. As the name suggests, it has the ability to interact with radio signals in a radius of 200m. The device is able to process radio waves with a frequency range between 30 and 300MHz.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]moderate electric power consumption

The first prototype was designed in 2008 under Professor Sakharov's supervision in the mobile lab in Yantar. Since then, more copies have been made after its proven success in field study. This device is able to take and record measurements of anomalous fields. Its improved framework and high sensitivity sensors, guarantee reliable operation even in the most hostile environments.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]moderate electric power consumption

This PDA seems badly damaged; half the screen is broken and the GPS module doesn't work properly. The interior is still safe for the most part.

A standard, head-mounted flashlight. Useful for stalkers who find themselves out and about after dark, but may attract trouble if used unwisely. Useful as it frees up both hands for field operations.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:

A standard head-mounted flashlight in fully working order. Useful for stalkers who find themselves out and about after dark, but may attract trouble if used unwisely. This head lamp comes with a standard-issue 1PN93-1 Russian Military Forces night-vision device. Offers generation 2+ image intensification, especially useful for operations at night or in low-light conditions.

This head lamp has image-processing software that removes video noise and enhances image-intensifying capabilities of PN21K unit, thus making it a full-fledged IIT generation 3+ night vision device.

A general purpose, hand-held flashlight. Unfortunately, it cannot be used along with most weapons, since it requires a free hand. Thus, is can be used simultaneously only with pistols and other single-handed equipment.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]moderate electric power consumption

Only one out of ten batteries found in the Zone still carry some juice. Stalkers seem to throw them out when they're depleted since it's almost impossible to find a battery recharger. Their outer layer is corroded and covered in dirt, which is a strong indication that these are almost dead. Still, like everything in the Zone they also have their purpose and may prove useful for frequent electric power recharges.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]junk

A pack of batteries. Intended for use in flashlights, PDAs, night vision goggles and other electronic devices. Remember to keep a few spare ones in case of an emergency.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]energy source

A pack of fully charged, military batteries. Very valuable and in high demand, due to the relative scarcity of batteries in the Zone. Used by all factions and stalkers of all levels, from rookies to master stalkers. Supplied to traders by corrupt military officers trying to earn some extra dough in the Zone.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]energy source

A Geiger counter measures ionizing radiation. It detects the emissions of alpha, beta and gamma particles. Invented in 1908, Geiger counters remain popular to this day and are used for measurements in health, physics, industry, geology and other fields. Made of simple electronic circuits.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2]%c[ui_gray_2]measures the level of radioactive contamination
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]moderate electric power consumption

Cold War era power unit about the size of a small walkie-talkie. Accepts almost any type of batteries. Utilizes every bit of energy from inserted batteries and supplies electronic devices with power in an enhanced stream through a set of micro wires. These can be connected to any piece of equipment, regardless of its complexity or age. Allows stalkers to use and handle numerous electronic devices, even if they have only one battery.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]portable energy source
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]accepts all battery types

An expensive moisture and shock-resistant PDA, featuring a chat client and an integrated music player.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2]allows for playback of music and interaction in the stalker network

A prototype of the next generation GPS navigation devices. Only a few copies are made. Although distributed exclusively among the highest military ranks, some devices have found their way into the hands of other parties as well. This improved module, featuring an improved framework and high sensitivity sensors, guarantees reliable operation even in the most hostile environments. Unlike usual GPS modules, this one relies on sets of codes that allows the module to acquire special privileges on the connected network. It retrieves the position of other connected modules in a radius of 300 meters. On the other hand, this module consumes a considerable amount of electrical power during operation. An automatic switching circuit inside the module, turns it off after 20 seconds of continuous scanning, to save power.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]very high electric power consumption
A modified radio, designed to communicate with other radios, filtering out as much interference as possible.\n \n

An advanced pulse-Doppler, weather radar mini-kit. This kit is considered a miracle in meteorology field. It sends directional pulses of microwave radiation, with a transmission speed of approximately one microsecond, using a cavity magnetron connected by a waveguide to a parabolic antenna, to collect weather data.
 Two scientists found out that using a "Meatchunk" artefact near the antenna can greatly amplify the pulse power, to the point it alters the ions in the Troposphere layer of the atmosphere, changing its properties completely.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]powered by a Meatchunk artefact
